about_the_game:
TimeTrain is a simple but mind-bending puzzle game in which you create train routes through time as well as space. Tamper with temporality and cause chaos with causality across 50 brain-boggling puzzles! This free demo features the first 15 puzzles of the full game.

The number above each portal tells you how far back or forward in time it will send the train. To beat each level simply build a track that will send the TimeTrain to collect all the trophies scattered across the puzzle area. Be warned, however, as there are deadly traps that will destroy the TimeTrain if you do not deactivate them at the right time... and the right time might just be in the past or future!

TimeTrain is a simple but mind-bending puzzle game in which you create train routes through time as well as space. Tamper with temporality and cause chaos with causality across 50 brain-boggling puzzles! This free demo features the first 15 puzzles of the full game.

The number above each portal tells you how far back or forward in time it will send the train. To beat each level simply build a track that will send the TimeTrain to collect all the trophies scattered across the puzzle area. Be warned, however, as there are deadly traps that will destroy the TimeTrain if you do not deactivate them at the right time... and the right time might just be in the past or future!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ (Vulkan support required)

name: TimeTrain Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese
